Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The British School of Guangzhou Dance Academy run by Miss Stephenson (current Head of Primary PE) is pleased to announce additional classes to begin in Term 2 commencing the week beginning 7th January.
All classes run during school term time these include the following;
Children’s Ballet and Tap Class
Fridays 3:00pm-4:00pm 900RMB for 9x1 hour sessions
Registration and first class Friday 11th January
Sundays 1:00pm-2:00pm 900RMB for 9x1 hour sessions
Registration and first class Sunday 13th January
_________________________________________________________
Dancercise (NEW)
Children’s Dance class for Fun including Street Dance, Disco and Latin styles for all ages and abilities
Sundays 2:00pm-3:00pm 100RMB per session
First Class Sunday 13th January
_________________________________________________________
20-20-20 ADULT EXERCISE TO MUSIC CLASS (NEW)
Wednesdays 4:30-5:30 40RMB per session
1 Hour session
10min Warm up, Pulse raiser and Stretching
20-min Aerobic/Cardio Work (with a mixture of traditional Aerobics, Taebo, and Latinelements)
20-min Body Conditioning (Legs/Bums and Tums toning and strength work)
10-min Cool down, Stretch and Flexibility
All abilities and fitness levels are welcome.
_________________________________________________________
Please click here view the attached Dance Academy Flyer for further information or contact Miss Stephenson directly: kate.stephenson@bsg.org.cn
Regards,
Kate Stephenson Head of Primary PE The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
